General.Name: Thumzup Media Corporation
General.Description: Thumzup Media Corporation operates as a software as a service provider in the United States. The company develops and builds influencer community mobile app under Thumzup name. Its mobile app incentivizes real people to become content creators and post authentic posts on social media about the advertiser and its products. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
General.Address: 711 South Carson Street, Carson City, NV, United States, 89701

0.Name: Mr. Robert  Steele
